name: Evolved Enchantment
additionalInfo: Acquired by crafting with Madstone. See the Madstone article for crafting mechanics.
Provides either +40 Primary Attribute OR +24 All Attributes
For Strength heroes: 40 main attack damage, 880 health, 4 health regen
For Agility heroes: 40 main attack damage, 6.67 armor, 40 attack speed
For Intelligence heroes: 40 main attack damage, 480 mana, 2 mana regen, 4% magic resistance
For Universal heroes: 32.4 main attack damage, 528 health, 2.4 health regen, 4 armor, 24 attack speed, 288 mana, 1.2 mana regen, 2.4% magic resistance
